title: 0s and 1s
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/3f205477c0.817248fb77.bJhL03.jpeg?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"\nA computer crashes and prints the error message.  You need to fix it.  The problem is that computer prints the error message in binary.  The binary is also opposite of what is should be.  The binary reads, \"01000011 01110010 01100001 01110011 01101000 00101100 00100000 01110000 01101100 01100101 01100001 01110011 01100101 00100000 01110010 01100101 01100010 01101111 01101111 01110100.\"  Solve the answer below."}]}]}

title: 0s and 1s
body: {"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"image","attrs":{"src":"/brilliantexport/brioche/solvable/3f205477c0.817248fb77.jhEz4V.jpeg?width=250"}},{"type":"text","text":"\nA computer crashes and prints the error message.  You need to fix it.  The problem is that computer prints the error message in binary.  The binary is also opposite of what is should be.  The binary reads, \"01000011 01110010 01100001 01110011 01101000 00101100 00100000 01110000 01101100 01100101 01100001 01110011 01100101 00100000 01110010 01100101 01100010 01101111 01101111 01110100.\"  Solve the answer below."}]}]}

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Quick Solution"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"there are 20 binary sets shown, corresponding to 20 characters. (each can represent an alphanumeric char, spaces, punctuation, symbols)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"the answer is obvious among the choices. you should make choices all 20 strings long."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Proper Solution: "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"convert the binary to decimal and follow the ASCII table, it will become "Crash, please reboot" (comma and spaces has an ASCII value)."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

title: 000s and 111s

discussion.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                
                                
                                
                                    
                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Each term takes the number of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"s and the number of "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":"s in the previous term and concatenates them."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"bulletList","content":[{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Start with "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" one and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" zeros, so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" one and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" zero, so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"2"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ones and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" zeros, so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"20"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"20"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"0"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" ones and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" zero, so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"01"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]},{"type":"listItem","content":[{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"01"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" has "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" one and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" zero, so "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"\boxed{11}"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}}]}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Since each term only depends on the previous one, the rest of the sequence will just be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"20, 01, 11"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" repeated indefinitely."}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                    
                                
                            "}]}

replies.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            Technically it's not "},{"type":"text","text":"periodic","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":", but your intention is clear: the sequence is definitely "},{"type":"text","text":"eventually periodic","marks":[{"type":"bold"}]},{"type":"text","text":".  In fact, no matter which natural number seed you choose, the resulting sequence will always be eventually periodic and the repeating terms will always be "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11, 20, 01"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (though any of the three terms could appear before the other two in the sequence)

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}

comments.body:
{"type":"doc","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                        

                                        "},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"
                                            

                                            
                                            You stole the words right from my mouth! ;)"}]},{"type":"text","text":"

"},{"type":"paragraph","content":[{"type":"text","text":"Another trait about this sequence is that it is periodic, or that after the seed value "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"1"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"a_1=10"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":", the sequence repeats the terms "},{"type":"katex","content":[{"type":"text","text":"11, 20, 01"}],"attrs":{"inline":true}},{"type":"text","text":".

                                        "}]},{"type":"text","text":"

                                        
                                            
                                        

                                        

                                        
    

    


                                    "}]}
